code: import React from'react';import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import{AppForm,AppFormField,SubmitButton}from"../components/forms";import*as Yup from'yup';import Screen from"../components/Screen";var validationScheme=Yup.object().shape({name:Yup.string().min(1).required(),email:Yup.string().required('Vui lòng nhập email').email('Email không hợp lệ').label('Email'),password:Yup.string().required().min(4).label('Password')});var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(values){};function RegisterScreen(){return React.createElement(Screen,{style:styles.container},React.createElement(AppForm,{initialValues:{name:'',email:'',password:''},validationSchema:validationScheme},React.createElement(AppFormField,{name:"name",icon:"account",placeholder:"Name",autoCapitalize:"none",autoCorrect:false}),React.createElement(AppFormField,{name:"email",icon:"email",placeholder:"Email",autoCapitalize:"none",autoCorrect:false,keyboardType:"email-address"}),React.createElement(AppFormField,{name:"password",icon:"lock",placeholder:"Password",autoCapitalize:"none",autoCorrect:false,secureTextEntry:true}),React.createElement(SubmitButton,{title:"register"})));}var styles=StyleSheet.create({container:{padding:10}});export default RegisterScreen;
